translation.en: Yeah, I mean, you don't seem crazy
translation.zh: 嗯 我觉得你很正常

translation.en: and I don't feel like meeting with a ton of people. So?
translation.zh: 而我不想要带一大堆人看房 如何？

translation.en: Wow, okay. Great.
translation.zh: 好 太好了

translation.en: Great. I'll text that other girl and tell her to not to come over.
translation.zh: 好的 那我就通知另一个女孩 不用来看了

translation.en: You snooze, you lose.
translation.zh: 只要你打个瞌睡 可就没机会了

translation.en: Cool. So were you, like, living with another roommate, or...
translation.zh: 所以你之前有室友 还是…

translation.en: I mean, my boyfriend kind of lived here with me.
translation.zh: 我男友之前住在这

translation.en: It was sort of on and off. He'd come and go.
translation.zh: 我们之间时好时坏 他来来去去的

translation.en: He'd mainly live with his parents, but... then we broke up, so whatever. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 他和父母一起住 但我们分手了 就这样

translation.en: Oh, um, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Don't be. I'm so glad we broke up...
translation.zh: 不要这么说 我很高兴我们分手

translation.en: I just don't really wanna live alone, you know?
translation.zh: 我只是很不想要一个人住 你懂吧？

translation.en: Well, that's perfect. We can hang out.
translation.zh: 嗯 那很好 我们可以一起玩

translation.en: And we will.
translation.zh: 我们会的

translation.en: I just wanna really clearly establish the roommate boundaries initially.
translation.zh: 但我还是得说清楚室友间 还是得保有一些界线

translation.en: [stuttering] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好 当然

translation.en: That actually sounds like we've got a lot in common.
translation.zh: 听起来我们应该会很合得来

translation.en: Well... [smacks lips]
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: get out of my space! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 离开我的地盘！

translation.en: This is gonna be fun.
translation.zh: 看来我们会相处得很融洽

translation.en: But, Mother, why is the wolf following me?
translation.zh: 但妈妈 为什么狼会跟着我？

translation.en: Do not fear him. He is your protector.
translation.zh: 不要害怕他 他是你的守护者

translation.en: Now that you're becoming a woman, your powers are growing.
translation.zh: 现在你要成为女人了 你的力量会越来越强大

translation.en: My powers? Am I becoming a witch?
translation.zh: 我的力量？我会成为女巫吗？

translation.en: We will know soon enough.
translation.zh: 我们不久后就会知道

translation.en: When your body aligns with the lunar cycle.
translation.zh: 你的身体将随着月亮周期变化

translation.en: Now, command the wolf.
translation.zh: 现在试着命令狼

translation.en: -[inhales sharply] -Sabien, submit.
translation.zh: 萨宾 听着

translation.en: He's not even looking at me.
translation.zh: 他根本不理我

translation.en: Uh, cut!
translation.zh: 卡！

translation.en: All right, let's get the wolf to sit. How about that? What's the problem?
translation.zh: 我们让狼先休息一下 好吗？什么问题？

translation.en: Arya, you have to make your hand a fist or the wolf won't sit.
translation.zh: 阿雅 你得先握拳不然他不会坐下

translation.en: I was.
translation.zh: 我有啊

translation.en: No, actually, you were just holding your hand up.
translation.zh: 你只是把手举高

translation.en: Are you blind or something?
translation.zh: 你是瞎了吗？

translation.en: I was doing exactly what you said to. The dog's just stupid.
translation.zh: 我完全照着你做 是那只狗太笨

translation.en: God, just check the playback, I was doing it.
translation.zh: 天啊 你去看回放 我有这么做

translation.en: Arya, superstar, what up?
translation.zh: 阿雅天后 怎么了？

translation.en: [groaning] I'm so tired!
translation.zh: 我好累！

translation.en: -Evan. -Hey, what's up, man?
translation.zh: -艾文 -嘿 怎么啦？

translation.en: Hey, man. What's going on?
translation.zh: 嘿 怎么回事？

translation.en: Not much. What do you need?
translation.zh: 没事 你想说什么？

translation.en: -Tutor time. -Seriously? You're doing this now?
translation.zh: -家教时间 -认真的？你说现在吗？

translation.en: Dude, have you been paying attention? We lose the wolf in half an hour.
translation.zh: 你刚有在看吗？ 我们已经花了半小时在狼身上

translation.en: No, I get it. I just... you know...
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是…你知道…

translation.en: Arya needs her three hours of class...
translation.zh: 阿雅每天需要上3小时课

translation.en: -every day. -Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I'm dealing with a child actor and a live animal here.
translation.zh: 我得面对一个小童星 和一只活生生的狼

translation.en: I-- I just need you to be a team player.
translation.zh: 我需要你配合一点

translation.en: I know. But I feel like it's always
translation.zh: 我知道 但我总觉得

translation.en: animals that are coming in and push, you know...
translation.zh: 我知道 但我总觉得 一直都是动物的问题 今天是蛇 明天又是…

translation.en: One day it's snakes, the next day it's--
translation.zh: 一直都是动物的问题 今天是蛇 明天又是…

translation.en: Dude, have you ever worked on a supernatural period piece before?
translation.zh: 你有参与过超自然力量的制作吗？

translation.en: Come on, man. Everyday there's a serpent or there's a mule.
translation.zh: 别这样 每天都是蛇或是骡子之类的

translation.en: I'm looking out for Arya here, okay?
translation.zh: 我只是在照顾阿雅 好吗？

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, man. They're witches, they deal with animals.
translation.zh: 我真不知道要怎么说 她们扮演女巫 就是得和动物相处

translation.en: Evan, she needs three hours of class every day, okay?
translation.zh: 艾文 她每天需要上3小时的课 懂吗？

translation.en: So we're doing this.
translation.zh: 所以我们就得这么做

translation.en: Seriously? That's the tone you're gonna take?
translation.zh: 你认真的？你要像这样跟我讲话？

translation.en: Yeah, come on, man. It's the law.
translation.zh: 对 是啊 这是法律的规定

translation.en: -It's called working-- -What's going on?
translation.zh: -工作就是这样… -怎么回事？

translation.en: -Is there an issue? -Susan, hey.
translation.zh: -有问题吗？ -苏珊 嗨

translation.en: Uh, no issues.
translation.zh: 没有问题

translation.en: Lovin' the scene, it's so good.
translation.zh: 场景很好 一切都顺利

translation.en: Guys, this wolf is almost out the door.
translation.zh: 两位 狼马上要走了

translation.en: -Can we handle this some other time? -[Evan] Yes.
translation.zh: -有事之后再讨论好吗？ -好

translation.en: Right, but it's just--
translation.zh: 好的 但是…

translation.en: If Arya's not in class
translation.zh: 假如有人通报

translation.en: and somebody reports this, we could lose our jobs and--
translation.zh: 阿雅没去上课 我们可能会失去工作…

translation.en: [scoffs] Dude, you are the only one that cares about--
translation.zh: 就只有你会这样想…

translation.en: But we could. We could lose our jobs!
translation.zh: 我们都会失去工作！

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Why are we going crazy here?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们怎么啦？

translation.en: Gus, listen.
translation.zh: 格斯 听着

translation.en: I respect your passion and commitment here.
translation.zh: 我尊重你的工作热情和使命感

translation.en: -Thank you. Thank you. -[Susan] You know?
translation.zh: -谢谢 -你们知道吗？

translation.en: Yeah, and, you know, and if the wolf goes away before we get this shot, you know, that's... that's fine.
translation.zh: 假如狼在拍摄完成前跑了 没关系啊

translation.en: You know, we'll... we'll work it out.
translation.zh: 我们再想办法就好

translation.en: That means so much. I appreciate that. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这意义重大 我很感激你 谢谢

translation.en: What would that mean, Evan?
translation.zh: 所以你认为如何 艾文？

translation.en: I'm guessing we just have to come in on Saturday to finish?
translation.zh: 我想我们得在这周六加班完成？

translation.en: Uh-huh. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yeah, just come in over the weekend.
translation.zh: 那就这么做吧

translation.en: -Yep. Mmm-hmm. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: The crew will probably not like that much.
translation.zh: 工作人员可能不想这么做

translation.en: [Evan] Oh, they're gonna be pissed.
translation.zh: 他们已经很生气了

translation.en: I mean, I guess you don't give a fuck about
translation.zh: 我想对于花时间在小孩身上

translation.en: people spending time with their kids. Oh, wait, you don't have kids.
translation.zh: 你应该没什么意见 等一下 你没有小孩

translation.en: -[Evan] That's for sure. -Uh...
translation.zh: 没有错

translation.en: I feel like we're wasting time by arguing about it, so...
translation.zh: 我觉得我们浪费太多时间在争吵 所以…

translation.en: [inhales] Let's just do it.
translation.zh: 所以就这样吧

translation.en: -Really? Excellent. -[Gus] We'll do it. Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: -真的？很好 -就这么做吧

translation.en: You're my soldier.
translation.zh: 你是我的勇士

translation.en: All right, we got another take, everybody. Second take.
translation.zh: 我们再拍一个镜头 各位 第二次拍

translation.en: Uh, why does everyone else get a CGI wolf? Why the fuck do we have a real wolf here?
translation.zh: 为什么其他人可以用后制合成狼？ 为什么我们要用真的？

translation.en: Arya, hey. False alarm.
translation.zh: 阿雅 嘿 虚惊一场

translation.en: It's gonna be about 50 more minutes. And then, we'll take it to class.
translation.zh: 再拍50分钟 然后我们就去上课

translation.en: I can't. I need a nap.
translation.zh: 不行 我要休息

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Nope. No naps today.
translation.zh: 不 今天不休息

translation.en: -I've been here since 6:00. -I know that.
translation.zh: -我早上6点就来了 -我知道

translation.en: But how you gonna count all that money you got if, uh, you don't know math, right?
translation.zh: 假如不上数学课你就没无法 正确算出你赚了多少钱 对吧？

translation.en: Um, Jeff, the accountant?
translation.zh: 可以找杰夫 那个会计师？

translation.en: Right, Jeff.
translation.zh: 对 杰夫

translation.en: He's an Orthodox Jew, I think he knows what he's doing.
translation.zh: 他是正统的犹太人 我想他可以做得很好

translation.en: [man on radio] Our next caller is Jason from Chicago.
translation.zh: 下一位是来自芝加哥的杰森

translation.en: Jason, how we doin'? How's our day going?
translation.zh: 杰森 在做什么呢？今天好吗？

translation.en: [Jason] Well, my mom passed away.
translation.zh: 嗯 我妈今天去世了

translation.en: Oh. My condolences.
translation.zh: -请节哀 -我想说的是

translation.en: I have to say, I'm not too torn up about it,
translation.zh: -请节哀 -我想说的是 我没有很伤心

translation.en: and actually, that's what's kind of got me upset.
translation.zh: 其实 这就是我为什么烦心

translation.en: The fact that I'm not upset.
translation.zh: 我没有伤心这个事实

translation.en: We can't control how we feel.
translation.zh: 我们无法控制我们的情绪

translation.en: And sometimes... [inhales]
translation.zh: 而有时候…

translation.en: these archetypical people in our lives, they hurt us.
translation.zh: 出现在人生里的原型人格 会伤害我们

translation.en: And they don't fulfill the archetype.
translation.zh: 而原型人格和平常的人不完全一样

translation.en: What... what's an archetype?
translation.zh: 什么是原型？

translation.en: An archetype is a...
translation.zh: 所谓的原型就是…

translation.en: Well, I don't really have the exact definition.
translation.zh: 嗯 我无法切确说出它的定义

translation.en: I do know what it means, obviously, because I just used it. Um...
translation.zh: 但我知道它的意思 我刚刚用了 收尾

translation.en: Well, thank you so much for calling.
translation.zh: 总之 谢谢你的来电

translation.en: I am Dr. Greg Coulter
translation.zh: 我是葛雷格寇特博士

translation.en: and you are listening to the Love and Living Channel
translation.zh: 你现在收听的是G重力卫星电台的

translation.en: on Gravity Satellite Radio.
translation.zh: 爱与生活节目

translation.en: You listen, we hear.
translation.zh: 你收听 而我们倾听

translation.en: Great. Great show, Greg.
translation.zh: 很好 很好的节目 葛雷格

translation.en: [Dr. Greg] Oh, thanks so much, Rob.
translation.zh: 非常谢谢你 罗伯

translation.en: -I really appreciate it. -So good.
translation.zh: -我真的很谢谢你 -太棒了

translation.en: -Good morning, Mickey. -Hey, you said you wanted to talk?
translation.zh: -早安 米琪 -你说想要聊聊？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: We need to fire Rob. Rob's gotta go. Does that make me evil?
translation.zh: 我们得开除罗伯 罗伯得走 我这样很坏吗？

translation.en: No! Please. This is a business.
translation.zh: 不 拜托 这是工作

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 这样如何？

translation.en: Can you fire him for me... huh?
translation.zh: 你可以帮我开除他吗？

translation.en: -Or do program managers not do that? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 还是说节目经理不做这种事？

translation.en: What? I mean, okay, you know what? I'll do it.
translation.zh: 可以吗？好吧 我来吧

translation.en: If you do it, Rob will think I'm a coward.
translation.zh: 假如你去 罗伯会觉得我是胆小鬼

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's probably the right move.
translation.zh: 对 我想这样做比较好

translation.en: No, wait, you know what? You do it.
translation.zh: 等一下 还是你来吧

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'll stop being annoying.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我会停止这么烦人

translation.en: So what's the problem? What did he do?
translation.zh: 所以到底是什么问题？他做错什么？

translation.en: Look... Rob does a great job...
translation.zh: 听着 罗伯做事很认真

translation.en: but the guy creeps me out.
translation.zh: 但是他让我很害怕

translation.en: He's got this look in his eyes. You ever meet a person
translation.zh: 他总是这样看着我 难道你没遇过像他这样

translation.en: and they smile, and you feel like they're screaming at you?
translation.zh: 对着你笑 但你会觉得 像是在对你大叫的人？

translation.en: What? Rob?
translation.zh: 什么？你说罗伯吗？

translation.en: Rob's like the nicest guy in the whole world.
translation.zh: 罗伯是这世界上心眼最好的人

translation.en: He's nicer than both of us.
translation.zh: 他甚至都比我们都还好心

translation.en: Well, he's just got this bad energy, this aura around him.
translation.zh: 嗯 他只是有股负面能量 一直在他附近

translation.en: Has he ever done anything to you?
translation.zh: 他对你做了什么？

translation.en: He asked me do I like him.
translation.zh: 他问我喜不喜欢他

translation.en: That's weird, right? That's not a thing you ask anybody.
translation.zh: 这不是很奇怪吗？ 这不是一般人会问的问题

translation.en: -Let alone in a workplace. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 尤其是在职场上

translation.en: Look... I would fire him but I can't take that on right now.
translation.zh: 听着 我会开除他 但不是立刻这么做

translation.en: This might be a difficult thing for you to understand
translation.zh: 这对你来说 可能有点难理解

translation.en: but I am very vulnerable in this job.
translation.zh: 但我做这份工作时很容易被影响

translation.en: I have to be.
translation.zh: 我必须得这样

translation.en: I make myself vulnerable to the world.
translation.zh: 我对这一切都很在意

translation.en: I can't be vulnerable around somebody like Rob.
translation.zh: 我不能让罗伯影响我

translation.en: So he's gotta go.
translation.zh: 所以他得离开

translation.en: Fine, I'll do it just to end this conversation.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会这么做 我们结束这个话题吧

translation.en: I'm a pussy, aren't I?
translation.zh: 我是懦夫 对吧？

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm disgusting.
translation.zh: 对不起 我真让人讨厌

translation.en: Okay, you know what? I'll do it.
translation.zh: 好吧 你知道吗？我会处理

translation.en: -[whispers] Thank you. -Oh, question.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -问你一个问题

translation.en: What is a good band to work out to? Something new.
translation.zh: 有什么好的新乐团吗？ 来点有新意的

translation.en: [exhales] I don't know. The Monkees?
translation.zh: 我不知道 猴子乐团？

translation.en: That's great. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Thanks, you're the best. You know what?
translation.zh: 谢啦 你人真好 知道吗？

translation.en: You fire Rob.
translation.zh: 还是你来开除罗伯吧

translation.en: [woman] So how was the move out of the Springwood?
translation.zh: 亚历山大亮点餐厅 搬离春木的事怎么样？

translation.en: Uh, you know, it's funny it didn't end up actually happening.
translation.zh: 有趣的是 最后这件事没发生

translation.en: He finally realizes that the Springwood rules.
translation.zh: 他终于理解了春木的规矩

translation.en: You love it there, right?
translation.zh: 你喜欢那里 对吧？

translation.en: No. I mean... not exactly.
translation.zh: 不 我是说…也不完全喜欢

translation.en: You can live anywhere in LA!
translation.zh: 你可以住在洛杉矶任何地方！

translation.en: Okay, like, where?
translation.zh: 好啊 像是哪里？

translation.en: I mean... [stutters] I've been looking, but it's just...
translation.zh: 我找过了 但就是…

translation.en: I'm having a hard time finding a place I like.
translation.zh: 我很难找到我喜欢的

translation.en: You can move near me. The Eastside.
translation.zh: 你可以过来我那附近 东边

translation.en: I don't know. It's just a little too cool. And now...
translation.zh: 我不知道 那里有点太酷了 而且现在…

translation.en: I'd be like the Beverly Hills guy with, like, a white Corvette.
translation.zh: 我想住在比弗利山庄那边 开一辆白色科尔维特跑车

translation.en: [clears throat] I mean, is that what we're doing?
translation.zh: 我们不是在说这个吗？

translation.en: [stammers] We're just playing what we'd wanna be?
translation.zh: 说我们想成为的样子？

translation.en: I don't think it's, like, what I want to be. It's, like, who I am.
translation.zh: 我觉得不是说想要成为的样子 而是说我是谁

translation.en: Like, who am I?
translation.zh: 像是我到底是谁？

translation.en: I mean, like, where do guys like me live, you know?
translation.zh: 像我这样的人都住在哪里？

translation.en: Where do the, like, repressed hostile nerds
translation.zh: 哪里适合被欺压又被仇视

translation.en: whose girlfriend's accuse them of being "fake nice" live?
translation.zh: 又被女友认为很“做作”的怪人住？

translation.en: -Santa Monica? -No.
translation.zh: -圣莫尼卡？ -不

translation.en: As long as I stay in the Springwood, you know...
translation.zh: 只要我继续住在春木

translation.en: maybe I get a text from Natalie saying, "Let's try it again."
translation.zh: 我可能会收到娜塔莉的短信 写着：“让我们再试试”

translation.en: And I can just bop out of the Springwood back to another place
translation.zh: 这样就可以离开春木到别处去

translation.en: instead of like, bop Springwood, bop new place, bop Natalie.
translation.zh: 而不是从春木到新的地方 从新的地方再到娜塔莉住处

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
translation.zh: 真是疯狂 不是吗？

translation.en: Please don't tell me you think you and Natalie are gonna get back together.
translation.zh: 别跟我说你想要跟娜塔莉复合

translation.en: -'Cause that's never gonna happen. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是不可能的事 -对

translation.en: You're saying it... like, it's over?
translation.zh: 意思是说 真的结束了？

translation.en: She cheated on you. Why would you wanna be with her?
translation.zh: 她劈腿 你怎么还会想要复合？

translation.en: Gus, she sucked, man.
translation.zh: 天啊 她糟透了 老兄

translation.en: [woman] Fuck Natalie. And fuck the Springwood.
translation.zh: 去他的娜塔莉 他妈的春木

translation.en: I think you'll find someone better.
translation.zh: 我相信你可以找到更好的人

translation.en: [stammers] You know, I know you'll find someone better
translation.zh: 真的 我也相信有更好的人

translation.en: and if you have trouble, I can set you up.
translation.zh: 假如你真的有困难 我可以帮你

translation.en: She wasn't right for you, dude.
translation.zh: 她不适合你

translation.en: I think I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: Gus. Wait. We gotta...
translation.zh: 格斯 等一下 我们得…

translation.en: [sighs] We gotta pay.
translation.zh: 我们得付钱

translation.en: Otis, put the dirt down now!
translation.zh: 欧提斯 别再玩土了！

translation.en: I suppose it's better than Heather's kid. -She eats dog shit. -[snorts]
translation.zh: 我想他已经比海瑟的小孩好多了 她连狗屎都吃

translation.en: [laughs] I'm serious.
translation.zh: 我是认真的

translation.en: Oh, my God, this day is dragging.
translation.zh: 噢 天啊 一天真是漫长

translation.en: You know what my favorite part of the day is?
translation.zh: 你知道一天中我最喜欢什么时候？

translation.en: [sighs] Taking my Ambien.
translation.zh: 吃安眠药的时候

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的假的？ -真的

translation.en: There's this moment right after it kicks in,
translation.zh: 吃完后感到无限美好

translation.en: and I'm still awake and everything is perfect.
translation.zh: 醒来后还是觉得一切很美好

translation.en: Seriously, I look forward to 9:30 every day.
translation.zh: 老实说 我很期待 每天早上的9点30分

translation.en: I don't like that shit.
translation.zh: 我一点都不喜欢

translation.en: I always wake up having made spaghetti.
translation.zh: 我一早起来做意大利面

translation.en: [chuckling] Spaghetti is the best. What's wrong with that?
translation.zh: 意大利面很好啊 意大利面哪里惹你了？

translation.en: You want some Ambien?
translation.zh: 你要来点安眠药吗？

translation.en: No, thanks. [sighs]
translation.zh: 不 谢了

translation.en: Are you sober?
translation.zh: 你现在清醒吗？

translation.en: Kinda.
translation.zh: 还行

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Fuck it! Give me some Ambien. Give me a whole handful.
translation.zh: 天啊！给我来一点 给我一大把好了

translation.en: [inhales sharply] All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I'm sure you have your own methods... but I turn off all electronic devices.
translation.zh: 我想你知道怎么做对你最好 我的话会关掉所有的电子产品

translation.en: The last time I took an Ambien, I emailed my high school principal
translation.zh: 上次我吃了药后发邮件给高中校长

translation.en: to tell him what a great job he had done.
translation.zh: 跟他说我觉得他做得好极了

translation.en: [chuckles softly] That's why you're my favorite neighbor.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么你是我最喜爱的邻居

translation.en: Otis, enough with the dirt.
translation.zh: 欧提斯 你玩够了没

translation.en: You have reached your quota.
translation.zh: 你再给我试试看

translation.en: Down.
translation.zh: 放下

translation.en: You know, I guess she used to be an extra on The Little Rascals.
translation.zh: 我想她曾经是《小淘气》的其中一个

translation.en: For real?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: -Yeah, no, she told me that. -[man] Jeez.
translation.zh: -对啊 她自己跟我说的 -天啊

translation.en: -Hey, what's going on? -Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 怎么了？

translation.en: What's happening here?
translation.zh: 这里发生什么事了？

translation.en: This old lady in E-2021 died.
translation.zh: 住在E2021的老太太死了

translation.en: I guess she fell in the shower
translation.zh: 我猜是在淋浴的时候跌倒

translation.en: and the water kept running on her body for, like, a week,
translation.zh: 然后水不断地从她身上流过 流了一星期

translation.en: so when they found her, the bathtub was full of mush.
translation.zh: 当他们发现她时 浴缸的水浓稠得不象话

translation.en: Jesus! [softly] What... What?
translation.zh: 天啊！怎么会？

translation.en: I told you not to give details.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你不要说得那么仔细

translation.en: Yeah, well, you're the one who gave me the details.
translation.zh: 嗯 是你跟我这么说的

translation.en: She lived here for 42 years, man.
translation.zh: 她住在这42年了

translation.en: -[whispers] Wow. -[softly] Yeah.
translation.zh: -是啊

translation.en: How long have you guys lived here? Eighteen years.
translation.zh: -你们住在这里多久了？ -18年

translation.en: They're roommates but they're not gay.
translation.zh: 他们是室友 不是同志伴侣

translation.en: Yeah, Chris, I don't care. That's fine.
translation.zh: 克里斯 我不在乎 没关系

translation.en: Why, did you think we were gay?
translation.zh: 你以为我们是同性恋？

translation.en: We're best friends. This is my BFF. We're roomies.
translation.zh: 我们是最好的朋友 这是我最好的朋友 我们是室友

translation.en: Yeah, no, he said... I didn't.
translation.zh: 不 是他说的 我没有

translation.en: I don't even care. It's fine.
translation.zh: 我一点都不在乎 没关系

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你们

translation.en: -Yep. -Take it easy.
translation.zh: -嗯 -放轻松

translation.en: Later, dudes.
translation.zh: 待会见 老兄

translation.en: Hey, we're not gonna wind up like those two guys, are we?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们以后不会像那一对老人吧？

translation.en: I hope so.
translation.zh: 我倒希望如此

translation.en: We should be so fucking lucky.
translation.zh: 我们要很幸运才会那样

translation.en: Thirty years of friendship?
translation.zh: 30年的友谊？

translation.en: We should be so fucking lucky, Gus.
translation.zh: 我们最好也能这么幸运 格斯

translation.en: Fuck it.
translation.zh: 去你的

translation.en: [sighs heavily] Shit.
translation.zh: 对不起 原谅我 聊聊吧 该死 今晚威尔顿3294号 幸福之家见？我想你 米琪

translation.en: You know what I love about Uber?
translation.zh: 你知道我为什么喜欢优步？

translation.en: You don't have to tip.
translation.zh: 你不用给小费

translation.en: Fuck taxis, man. Uber's changing the world.
translation.zh: 出租车去死吧 优步改变了世界

translation.en: And you own this car, right?
translation.zh: 而这辆车还是你的 不是吗？

translation.en: It's, like, a nice car.
translation.zh: 这真是辆好车

translation.en: -Yes, ma'am. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.zh: 没错 女士

translation.en: [softly] Oh, shit! Oh, fuck! Shit!
translation.zh: 葛雷格博士-搞定罗伯了？ 天啊！去你的！该死！

translation.en: [Rob on phone] Hello, this is Rob.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是罗伯

translation.en: Hi, this is Mickey Dobbs, the program manager from work.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是米琪多布斯 电台的节目经理

translation.en: Uh, anyway, you know that. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 总之 你知道的

translation.en: Um, I didn't...
translation.zh: 我不想

translation.en: Uh, I don't wanna do this over voicemail, but, um...
translation.zh: 我不想用语音留言做这件事 不过…

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 你好？

translation.en: Hello? Is this...
translation.zh: 你好？这是…

translation.en: is this one of those trick voicemail things?
translation.zh: 这是新的语言留言系统吗？

translation.en: Mickey, is that you?
translation.zh: 米琪 是你吗？

translation.en: God! Sorry! Your voice doesn't normally sound so message-y.
translation.zh: 天啊！抱歉！平常你的声音 听起来一点也不像语音留言

translation.en: [chuckles] No, it's me.
translation.zh: 不 是我

translation.en: We're gonna put Frozen on in one second, honey, I promise.
translation.zh: 我们先暂停《冰雪奇缘》一下 亲爱的 保证马上好

translation.en: Is everything okay?
translation.zh: 有什么事吗？

translation.en: Um... I don't know how to say this, uh...
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么开口

translation.en: I'm just gonna... I'm just gonna come right out
translation.zh: 我现在要说了

translation.en: and say it to you, 'cause I respect you, okay, Rob?
translation.zh: 我很尊敬你 好吗 罗伯？

translation.en: You are fired from, you know, work.
translation.zh: 你被开除了 我是说你的工作

translation.en: [scoffs] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Greg told you to fire me?
translation.zh: 葛雷格叫你开除我吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Aw.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: But... it's nothing personal.
translation.zh: 这跟个人情感没有关系

translation.en: Sure, it's not personal.
translation.zh: 当然没关系

translation.en: You're just Dr. Greg's little henchman, that's all.
translation.zh: 你只不过是葛雷格博士的走狗

translation.en: Oh, come on, man. Aren't we all henchmen?
translation.zh: 拜托 我们不都是走狗吗？

translation.en: "Aren't we all henchmen?" What the fuck does that mean?
translation.zh: “我们不都是走狗吗？” 该死的 你这是什么意思？

translation.en: Are you high right now?
translation.zh: 你现在很嗨吗？

translation.en: Are you on drugs?
translation.zh: 你嗑药了吗？

translation.en: -Drugs? -[car horns honking]
translation.zh: 嗑药？

translation.en: Oh, so you're firing me over the phone while you drive on drugs?
translation.zh: 所以你打电话来开除我 而且你还一边在嗑药？

translation.en: That's great. Why don't you show my daughter that?
translation.zh: 很好 怎么不跟我女儿说呢？

translation.en: Tell my six-year-old daughter that. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 告诉我6岁的女儿 说啊

translation.en: Hey, look, I drew a big star.
translation.zh: 嘿 你看 我画了一颗大星星

translation.en: Oh, she drew a big star... [whispering] you fucking cock-whore!
translation.zh: 她画了一颗大星星 你这个婊子！

translation.en: Whoa, dude, uncalled for! Shit!
translation.zh: 噢 老兄 干嘛这样！去你的！

translation.en: [Eric] Mickey.
translation.zh: 米琪

translation.en: -What the fuck are you wearing? -Aw.
translation.zh: 你怎么穿这样？

translation.en: I'm glad you made it.
translation.zh: 我真高兴你还是来了

translation.en: This is a really weird bar.
translation.zh: 这个酒吧好奇怪

translation.en: It's not a bar. You haven't heard of Bliss House?
translation.zh: 这里不是酒吧 你没听过幸福之家？

translation.en: No. What is this, like, a...
translation.zh: 没有 那是什么 像是…

translation.en: like, a club for old people?
translation.zh: 是老人俱乐部吗？

translation.en: It's a church. Well, they say it's... like a church for all churches, you know.
translation.zh: 是教堂 他们说… 像是所有信仰都能来的教堂

translation.en: It's more about oneness and togetherness, not so much a higher being.
translation.zh: 包容一切 不会太严肃

translation.en: But I'm... I'm trying to say I'm sorry, all right?
translation.zh: 我是想说抱歉 好吗？

translation.en: This is... this is how I'm trying to say I'm sorry to you.
translation.zh: 而这是我想要补偿你的方式

translation.en: The midnight service is the best one.
translation.zh: 午夜礼拜是最棒的

translation.en: -You're gonna love it. -Fuck, no.
translation.zh: -你会喜欢的 -见鬼 不

translation.en: Dude, no, no, I can't do that.
translation.zh: 天啊 不…我不要

translation.en: I'm wearing, like, a one-piece under jeans.
translation.zh: 我牛仔裤下只穿着泳衣

translation.en: Hey! Our buddy from the balcony!
translation.zh: 嘿！是阳台老兄！

translation.en: Hey, what's up? You guys! All right. There you are.
translation.zh: 嘿 你好吗？大家！你们都在这

translation.en: You dropped by. You even brought your work backpack.
translation.zh: 你来了 你还背了工作包来

translation.en: I'm Gus, by the way.
translation.zh: 我是格斯 自我介绍一下

translation.en: -I'm Nate. Good to meet you. -Hello. Hi.
translation.zh: -南特 很高兴认识你 -嗨

translation.en: -Hey, I'm Hailey. -Did you get a drink yet, man?
translation.zh: -嘿 我是海莉 -拿饮料了吗？

translation.en: Uh, you know what?
translation.zh: 知道吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Give me a beer.
translation.zh: 还没呢 给我啤酒吧

translation.en: -Give you a-- -[Gus] Yeah, give me a beer. Cool.
translation.zh: -来吧… -嗯 来杯啤酒 谢啦

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好 很好

translation.en: -Beer. [chuckles] -Thank you. Thanks.
translation.zh: -来啤酒 -谢谢你 谢啦

translation.en: -Cheers. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -干杯 -耶

translation.en: Good evening, blessed specimens of this lifetime.
translation.zh: 各位晚安 被祝福的人们

translation.en: How are you all feeling? I wanna hear you.
translation.zh: 你们现在觉得如何？ 我想听听你们怎么说

translation.en: Tonight, we stand together
translation.zh: 今晚 我们站在一起

translation.en: in a vibratory field of an advancing potential,
translation.zh: 被满满的爱灌注着

translation.en: the foundation of which is love.
translation.zh: 因此我们有着一股前进的动力

translation.en: Love doesn't just happen, we have to choose it.
translation.zh: 爱不会突然出现 我们得选择相信它的存在

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to agree with love.
translation.zh: 我们正在进化的道路上 所以我们要接受爱

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to embrace love.
translation.zh: 我们正在进化的道路上 所以我们要拥抱爱

translation.en: We have to see love, feel love, touch love, heal love.
translation.zh: 我们要看到爱 感受爱 触摸爱 治愈爱

translation.en: From the very core of our inner sanction.
translation.zh: 打从我们心底出发

translation.en: Right? You guys know what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 好吗？你们了解我说的

translation.en: -Come on, let me hear you. -[applause]
translation.zh: 来吧 让我听听你们的声音

translation.en: Holy fuck.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: You guys are doing it right. Seriously.
translation.zh: 你们真的很棒 老实说

translation.en: All of you guys, this is, like, what your twenties should be about.
translation.zh: 这就是20几岁的你们该做的

translation.en: Having fun, going wild.
translation.zh: 疯狂玩乐

translation.en: Ever since I was a little kid, I've been acting like a grown-up.
translation.zh: 从我小时候开始 我就一直装大人

translation.en: And now, it's like, I'm in my thirties,
translation.zh: 到了现在 我已经30几岁了

translation.en: and I'm, like...
translation.zh: 我却…

translation.en: "Oh, my God!"
translation.zh: “噢 我的天啊！”

translation.en: I need to make up for lost time.
translation.zh: 我应该要好好弥补过去

translation.en: Hey, let's get fucking crazy tonight!
translation.zh: 嘿 就让我们今晚疯狂一下吧！

translation.en: Will you shut the fuck up?
translation.zh: 你们他妈的可以安静一点吗？

translation.en: This is a family community.
translation.zh: 这是家庭住宅区

translation.en: Families live here. This isn't fucking Club Med!
translation.zh: 有家庭住在这里 这里不是夜总会！

translation.en: Hey! Uh, why don't you just, uh,
translation.zh: 嘿！为什么不让我们

translation.en: let us enjoy this one special moment in our lives...
translation.zh: 好好度过此生最棒的时刻

translation.en: before we, you know, fucking slip in a shower and turn to mush?
translation.zh: 在你还没有在浴室摔倒 满身腐烂之前？

translation.en: Go fuck yourself, man!
translation.zh: 去你的！

translation.en: -I love you guys! -[cheering]
translation.zh: 我真喜欢你们！

translation.en: I love this place!
translation.zh: 我喜欢这里！

translation.en: Guys, thank you so much.
translation.zh: 各位 真是谢谢你们了

translation.en: So fun. Really--
translation.zh: 真是太开心了 真的

translation.en: -You're the man, Gus. -[Gus] You guys are...
translation.zh: -你真是好人 格斯 -你们也是

translation.en: -All right, we'll see you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
translation.zh: -明天见 -明天见

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing now?
translation.zh: 嘿 你现在要做什么？

translation.en: Me? Um, sawing some logs. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我吗？回去伐木

translation.en: What... What does... What does that mean? I don't know what that means.
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -我不懂你的意思

translation.en: It means sleeping. It's like an old expression for sleeping.
translation.zh: 睡觉的意思 是老掉牙的说法

translation.en: -Oh. [chuckles] -Well, uh--
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: We still have a couple of hours to kill. Do you wanna hang out at your place?
translation.zh: 我们还想要消磨一些时间 我们可以去你的地方吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, okay. It's a little messy, if that's cool.
translation.zh: 嗯 好啊 可以 假如你们不介意有点乱的话

translation.en: [Hailey] Oh, God, it's fine.
translation.zh: 噢 天啊 没事的

translation.en: Oh, my God! Your bedroom is literally identical to ours.
translation.zh: 噢 老天！你的房间跟我们的好像

translation.en: -No way. Really? [chuckles] -Yeah. It's so lame, right?
translation.zh: -不会吧 真的？ -没错 很逊 是吧？

translation.en: Hey, look at these candles!
translation.zh: 嘿 你看这些蜡烛！

translation.en: -They've never even been lit. -[Hailey laughs] So lame.
translation.zh: -从来没有被点燃过 -太逊了

translation.en: It's crazy they have all the same stuff in every...
translation.zh: 真夸张 这里每个房间都一样

translation.en: -Yeah. -I know.
translation.zh: -对 -我知道

translation.en: -It's nuts. -It's, uh... They're like clones.
translation.zh: -太疯狂了 -直接复制

translation.en: -They're clones of each other. -[sighs] -[girl] Clones. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -它们一模一样 -一个样子

translation.en: I'm gonna miss it though.
translation.zh: 我会想念这里

translation.en: It sucks that we have to leave and fly back.
translation.zh: 真可惜我们得离开飞回家

translation.en: -[Gus] Uh... -We wanna move to LA after college.
translation.zh: 我们毕业后 想搬到洛杉矶

translation.en: -Ooh. -Oh, really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: -Yeah. [chuckles] -Oh, that's cool.
translation.zh: -对 -好极了

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause we never did anything fun while we were here.
translation.zh: 因为我们从没在这做过有趣的事情

translation.en: We had all these, like, wild, crazy plans.
translation.zh: 我们想过一些疯狂有趣的计划

translation.en: -[laughs] -Oh, really? Like what?
translation.zh: 真的？像是？

translation.en: You guys wanted to go to Six Flags or something, right?
translation.zh: 你们想去六旗游乐园还是？

translation.en: -[girl] No. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: No, like, um... [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 不是 是像…

translation.en: I don't know, uh... [sighs]
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: -Never mind. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 算了

translation.en: -You guys are-- -We, uh...
translation.zh: -你们想… -我们…

translation.en: We... we kinda...
translation.zh: 我们有点…

translation.en: -[chuckles] -We wanted to have a three-way.
translation.zh: 我们想来三人行

translation.en: Oh. Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Yeah. [chuckles] Uh, have-- -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 你有… -嗯

translation.en: Have you ever had one?
translation.zh: 你有玩过吗？

translation.en: Uh, no. [smacks lips]
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: -Mmm. Okay. -I... I don't think I have. No.
translation.zh: -好 -我想我没有玩过 没有

translation.en: -No, haven't had a three-way. -[all chuckles]
translation.zh: 没有 我没有过

translation.en: Well, um, I know Reese hasn't...
translation.zh: 嗯 我知道芮姿没有过

translation.en: -No? Right. [chuckles] -...and I haven't, and, uh...
translation.zh: -没有？好 -我也没有

translation.en: -And I-- Yeah, I haven't. Yeah. no. -And... you haven't.
translation.zh: -而我也没有 对 -你也没有

translation.en: So, yeah.
translation.zh: 所以 没错

translation.en: Um, so, is... is it happening?
translation.zh: 所以 我们来试试？

translation.en: Now, is this it? This is the three-way? Yeah?
translation.zh: 现在吗？就我们？三人行吗？

translation.en: -Yes, Gus. -Okay.
translation.zh: -对 格斯 -好的

translation.en: I think that was clear.
translation.zh: 我想这很明显了

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Children, please, step inside our vibratory field of energy and love
translation.zh: 孩子们 请和我们一起走进 充满能量与爱的领域

translation.en: and receive our message.
translation.zh: 接受满载我们的福音

translation.en: Remember, if you ask the world for love, you will receive love.
translation.zh: 记住 假如你向主请求爱 你将会接受到爱

translation.en: All of tonight's newcomers, please rise.
translation.zh: 今晚新来的人 请站起来

translation.en: Come on. I know-- I know you're digging this.
translation.zh: 来吧 我知道你开始喜欢这个了

translation.en: All right, fuck it. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 好吧 无所谓

translation.en: We speak from our eyes and say, welcome home.
translation.zh: 我们眼睛看着她们 对她们说 欢迎回家

translation.en: [all] "Welcome home."
translation.zh: “欢迎回家”

translation.en: -[man] We love you. -[all] "We love you."
translation.zh: -我们爱你们 -“我们爱你们”

translation.en: We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul.
translation.zh: 我们将靠近你们的心 拥抱你们的灵魂

translation.en: [all] "We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul."
translation.zh: “我们将靠近你们的心 拥抱你们的灵魂”

translation.en: Please, welcome our newcomers.
translation.zh: 请欢迎我们的新人

translation.en: This brings our service to an end.
translation.zh: 我们今天就到这里结束

translation.en: If you didn't get a chance to donate, the tithing baskets are up front.
translation.zh: 假如你还想要捐献 箱子就在前面

translation.en: [Mickey] Can I ask something?
translation.zh: 我可以问个问题吗？

translation.en: Yes.
